bug.author: timkpaine
bug.summary: Compile options for msvc are malformed
bug.description: Looks like the compile options for msvc are malformed in setup.py, MSVC shoudnt map to a dictionary. Let me know if you want me to PR

comments.comment: Sure! I haven't been able to debug on Windows yet. If you can get it working with NVCC as well that would be especially useful.
Got appveyor running, allowing me to reproduce the error. Should be fixed now. Should have better Windows support going forward, too!
